title: Check-In and Check-Out Policy
content: Check-in Time: 2:00 PM. Check-out Time: 12:00 PM. Late check-outs may be requested at booking or on departure day. Additional charges may apply.

title: Wi-Fi Usage
content: Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is available. Password: 'WorldOfWestin' + last 6 digits of phone number. Internet for lawful and personal use only.

title: Hotel Facilities Use
content: Swimming Pool: Open 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM. Spa requires booking in advance. Bar open daily, legal drinking age is 21+.

title: Reservation & Booking
content: Reservations should be made in advance. A valid credit card is required to guarantee booking.

title: Parking and Valet Services
content: Free valet and self-parking available. Guests are responsible for locking vehicles.

title: Event Hosting and Meetings
content: Bookings must be made 2 weeks in advance. Deposits may be required for large events.

title: Fitness Center
content: Open 24/7. Proper attire required. Wipe down equipment after use.

title: Pet Policy
content: Pets not allowed, except service animals.

title: Smoking Policy
content: No smoking in rooms, public areas, or restaurants. Cleaning fees apply for violations.

title: Quiet Hours
content: Quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM.

title: Damages and Property
content: Guests responsible for damages. Repair charges apply.

title: Accessibility
content: Accessible rooms available. Inform hotel in advance for accommodations.

title: Alcohol Policy
content: Alcohol allowed in designated areas. Legal drinking age is 21+.

title: Safety and Security
content: Follow safety policies. Store valuables in-room safe.

title: Lost and Found
content: Hotel not responsible for lost items. Contact front desk for assistance.

title: Airport Shuttle
content: Airport transfer available. Book 24 hours in advance.

title: Guest Behavior
content: Respect staff and guests. Disruptive behavior leads to removal.

title: Breakfast Buffet
content: Buffet from 8 AM to 10:30 AM. Veg and non-veg options available.
